summary: Core pages, navigation, inquiry form UI, admin inquiry list/details, and a Motoko backend with create/list/get inquiry methods were added. However, some BuildRequest requirements appear unmet or mismatched (notably inquiry form field rules, theme color constraint, and confirmation that required generated image files were added). Several extra features (user profiles, multiple message types, secret-token access-control initialization, and caffeine.ai branding) appear beyond the requested scope.

missing_requirements.requirement: Inquiry form must accept "email or phone" (at least one), not require email specifically.
missing_requirements.reason: The form currently validates Email as required while Phone is optional, which does not match the requirement of allowing either email or phone as the contact method.

missing_requirements.requirement: Visual theme should avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors.
missing_requirements.reason: The CSS theme sets primary/foreground-related hues around 270, which is typically in the blue/purple range, suggesting the theme may be primarily blue/purple.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the required generated static images under frontend/public/assets/generated with the specified filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI references the required filenames, but the diff summary does not show the actual image files being added (assets may be among omitted files, so this cannot be confirmed from provided evidence).

hallucinated_features.description: User profile storage and profile APIs (get/save caller profile, get user profile) with user-role permission checks.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in the BuildRequest; requirements focus on inquiries and admin viewing, not user profiles.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional inquiry/message categories (suggestion/complaint/praise) beyond the requested Buy/Sell/Partnership inquiry types.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest specifies inquiry type as Buy/Sell/Partnership; backend introduces unrelated messageType variants.

hallucinated_features.description: Secret-token based access-control initialization via URL parameter (caffeineAdminToken) and calling _initializeAccessControlWithSecret from the frontend actor hook.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not specified in requirements; admin access was requested via Internet Identity login, not via a secret URL token initialization mechanism.
Not requested as part of the marketing site requirements.
